es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api

Interface ILabelController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LabelController

    public interface ILabelController
    Interface for controller of Label. Details of Label and its properties in AmCharts API
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
